summary: AN ORDINANCE setting collection rates and charges of the Solid Waste Utility effective January 1, 1989; providing for curbside/alley pick-up, and for collecting yardwaste and white goods and bulky items and the rates therefor; modifying the rates for low-income elderly, handicapped or disabled; redefining terms, adding requirements, and making miscellaneous changes; and amending Sections 21.36.010, 21.36.050, 21.36.070, 21.36.080, 21.40.010, 21.40.050, 21.40.060, 21.40.080, and 21.26.040, and adding new sections in connection therewith.
